creator: tjsb@slb.com
text:
Enhancements to add various command line options:

-Dprop=value - define system property
-Jprop=value - define JMeter property
Both override any that are set in jmeter.propoerties

These are done after logging is set up, so to change the logging level there 
is an extra option:

-L[category=]level (e.g. -Ljmeter.util=DEBUG or -LDEBUG)

Also logging uses new category scheme, and added log.info when test scripts 
are loaded.

Created attachment 6691
JMeter patch - new options; logging enhancements
creator: tjsb@slb.com
